Via instruction parent skill behavior change strategy , end goal relative weight maintenance child healthy weight , relative weight reduction overweight child . The intervention focus preschooler ( 2-5 year age ) overweight obese mother , deliver second subsequent baby . 400 mother/preschooler dyad Triad Triangle area NC randomize : THE CONTROL ARM Mothers control arm receive monthly newsletter , give monetary incentive complete baseline follow-up assessment ; THE KAN-DO INTERVENTION ARM Mothers preschooler intervention group receive monthly mail family kit encourage interactive mother/child exercise healthy lifestyle change . Mailings support counsel call two in-person motivational/informational group session . The content intervention address parent skill , healthy eating , physical activity .
